name: Maid PizzaHub
description:
In Pizza Hub you can try any pizza for every taste. Spicy, sweet or maybe both? Our maid will serve you properly and bring your pizza hot on time! You won't be disappointed in it... Visit her at PizzaHub!

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level

FEATURES

  • ❤ Beautiful artwork
  • ❤ Animation scenes
  • ❤ Relaxing music
  • ❤ CG Gallery Mode
  • ❤ Puzzle game



    In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures.
